inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: complaining of persistent feelings of sadness in French

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: attending an appointment in a centre participating to the trial

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: giving his informed consent and accepting the modalities of the study

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: agreeing to attend up to 4 appointments dedicated to the study, during 8 weeks after the initial appointment (motivational interview)

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: agreeing to be registered within the system of text-based recalls for the duration of the study

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no current antiaggregant or anticoagulation therapy

notes: Patient is a 47-year-old Asian woman with persistent feelings of sadness, loss of interest in activities, and weight loss. She has no past medical history and her family history is negative for psychologic problems.
